feed.title: Google Cloud: VPC Service Controls
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: VPC Service Controls

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • License Manager
entry.summary: License Manager support is now in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Preview release of License Manager integration

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Address Validation API
  • Places (New) API
entry.summary: We are introducing preview support for Address Validation API and Places (New) API, enhancing your ability to manage security policies for these services.
entry.title: Feature: Preview Support for Address Validation and Places APIs

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • FleetPackage API
entry.summary: The FleetPackage API is now available in preview, enhancing integration capabilities within VPC Service Controls.
entry.title: Feature: Preview: FleetPackage API Support

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Parameter Manager
entry.summary: Parameter Manager is now generally available for integration, enhancing your ability to manage parameters within your systems.
entry.title: Feature: Parameter Manager Now Generally Available
